msgs.text:
A hands-on guide for newbies on how to contribute to Bitcoin OSS. It contains many tips and tricks to A) find something to do and B) survive the first code review without crying (or using `git merge`).
https://danielabrozzoni.com/posts/contributing_to_oss/
via https://twitter.com/danielabrozzoni/status/1586041763504197632?s=20&t=0po0OIbcKDDQck5VXSfMpg

Bitcoin & Lightning
Development Resources.
https://bitcoindev.org/
Bitcoindev.org
Saving Satoshi game to help learn Bitcoin code

Delving Bitcoin 
Site for technical discussions on Bitcoin 
https://delvingbitcoin.org/

Your Bridge To Building On Bitcoin
Developers! Check this out 
Bit script 
https://www.bitscript.app/

Libbitcoin is a multipurpose bitcoin library targeted towards high end use. An ideal backend to build fast implementations on top: mobile apps, desktop clients and server API's. The library places a heavy focus around asychronicity, speed and availability.
https://libbitcoin.info/
